templates.name: How do I fix jewelry that has become tarnished?
templates.content:
Our silver collections are made with 92.5% Sterling Silver and 7% alloy, including copper and zinc. Please note that tarnishing is not a manufacturing defect and can result due chemical reactions with moisture in your skin and alloys within the metal.

If your jewelry is tarnishing due to reactions with your skin, we suggest trying rhodium plating, in which a thin coating of rhodium will be applied to the silver, creating a protective barrier between the skin and the silver. Please contact our client care team at 1-888-838-3022 with any questions or concerns you may have about this process.

templates.name: How do I care for my boots?
templates.content: Footwear should be allowed to dry naturally before they're stored and shouldn't be stored near any heat source (temperatures not exceeding 86 degrees F. and in normal humidity (below 70%) are perfect). Use a soft brush to remove dirt and clean with mild soap and warm water. When dry, apply a coat of water repellant. This will help to maintain the color and camo pattern of your Cordura boots; as for Leather Boots, use a soft brush to remove dirt; polish may be applied to cover scuffs. Use a good leather conditioner or a very light coat of oil to keep your leather from drying and cracking. For Duty Shoes and Boots, you can use black paste polish and a good leather conditioner about 3 times a year. For Suede Shoes and Boots, remove the dirt with the help of small suede brush, and apply some suede protector and clean it with a specialized cleaner. For Patent Leather Shoes and Boots, you can clean it with a soft, damp cloth using diluted detergent. Add petroleum jelly to give it a shine. In the end buff it properly to remove the excess petroleum jelly. For Hand Sewn Shoes and Boots, you can remove loose dirt with a soft brush. Use a paste polish to cover scuffs. Apply a water repellant spray and a good leather conditioner about two times a year. As for Insoles and Footbeds, always remove foot beds from footwear after use. This allows perspiration to evaporate.

templates.name: Do I need new tubes?
templates.content: Installing new tubes may improve the performance of your amp, especially if it has been played a lot! Power tubes wear out with use, and they need changed on a regular basis. Preamp tubes can last much longer, and generally do not need to be changed unless you are unsatisfied with the sound of the amplifier. If your amp still sounds good and is as loud as it should be, you likely do not need to replace the tubes yet.

templates.name: What happens if I completely stop using the NIRA Pro Laser?
templates.content: The NIRA Pro Laser helps build new collagen, which is naturally depleted over time with age, environmental pollutants, and sun exposure.If you stop your NIRA laser treatment, you will likely start seeing natural signs of aging over time as new collagen production will no longer be stimulated. templates.name: Do I need to bleach my hair before applying the Unicorn Hair Dye?
templates.content: Unicorn Hair works best with hair that is pre-bleached, and platinum to light blonde. Full Coverage colors may tint any hair that is dark blonde/light brown, however, anything darker may not see a change in color. Since the product doesn't have any harsh chemicals or peroxide, it won't lift your current color; it'll simply lay on top of your current color. The darker the start color, the more of a tint. Anything darker than light brown may also not see a difference.

templates.name: How should I store my coffee?
templates.content: All whole-bean coffee orders are roasted fresh to order and ship directly from our roasting facility. Your whole-bean coffee is packed in a resistant, zip-locking bag that is heat-sealed with nitrogen on the same day the coffee is roasted. Nitrogen is puffed into the bag before sealing to displace the oxygen that stales coffee. Unopened bags of Purity Coffee will stay fresh tasting for about 10 months when packed with nitrogen, but of course it's best to consume sooner than later. The best way to store upon opening is in a well-sealed, opaque container on your pantry shelf. Once a bag has been opened, we recommend consumption within a month. If you have a large amount of coffee, such as a 5lb bag, and need to store it for longer after opening it, we recommend using a vacuum storage container. We recommend TightVac for up to 5 lbs of coffee storage or AirScape for a smaller storage container. Even with a vacuum storage container, it's best to portion out the amount you'll go through in 1-2 weeks in a separate, well-sealed container. This will ensure you aren't exposing the entirety of the coffee to oxygen on a daily basis.

templates.name: How do I clean my leather sofa?
templates.content: Your leather Allform will require little or no care during normal usage but the use of a quality leather conditioner every 6-12 months is recommended. For spills and stains, you should blot excess liquid with a clean, absorbent cloth or sponge. If necessary, use lukewarm water to gently clean the stain and allow to air dry. For stubborn stains, we recommend using a mild solution of Ivory soap and clear, lukewarm water to treat the spot. Please avoid the use of saddle soaps, oils, abrasive cleaners, soaps, furniture polish, oils, varnish, or ammonia water.

templates.name: Is hyaluronic acid harsh?
templates.content:
While we completely understand how the word "acid" can sound off-putting as a treatment for vaginal dryness, hyaluronic acid is a naturally-occurring molecule in the human body that can retain up to 1000x its weight in moisture. In the case of vaginal dryness, it works to attract and retain moisture in the cells of the vaginal lining, which helps to create a healing environment for thinning and damaged skin.

You can learn more about the benefits of hyaluronic acid for vaginal dryness here: https://bonafide.attn.tv/amCNmIpEh2di

templates.name: My camera is set to Photo + Video, why am I only getting photos?
templates.content: When your camera is set to Photo + Video, it takes a photo, then records a video starting 2 seconds after the photo was taken. It sends the photo and writes both the photo and video to the SD card but it does not send the video unless you request it. Once you request the video, it should appear in the app after the next time the camera contacts the server to send a photo or status report. If you request several videos from the same camera, they may come in one or two at a time.

templates.name: Do your products help with breast tenderness?
templates.content:
Relizen is specifically designed to help relieve symptoms associated with menopause, including breast pain or tenderness. While Relizen is primarily used for hot flashes and night sweats, many women report improvements in overall hormonal balance, which can also reduce breast discomfort.

If you're experiencing breast pain or tenderness, Relizen might help ease those symptoms by addressing underlying hormonal fluctuations.

However, it's always a good idea to consult a healthcare provider for a more personalized recommendation.

templates.name: How should I wash my Dippin' Daisy's suit?

templates.name: Can I wash my Mattress Protector?
templates.content: Yes, you can absolutely wash your mattress protector. We recommend washing it with cold water and normal household detergent. Please do not use bleach. Tumble dry on low heat. Do not iron or dry on medium/high heat as that will damage the waterproof layer of the protector.

templates.name: TurboWash vs TurboWash 360
templates.content: TurboWash makes use of a jet spray to significantly reduce washing times, create energy savings and deliver cleaner clothes. Spraying water directly onto fabrics, it enhances the exceptional washing and rinsing performance of 6 Motion Direct Drive technology. With TurboWash™360˚ it's more time saving and your laundry can be thoroughly done in just 39 minutes with more fabric protection. It also has 4 directions of 3D multi nozzles which reaches every inch of your laundry.

templates.name: Where are your products made?
templates.content: We're based in Boston with our warehouse in New Jersey. Our boots are only designed here. We actually got into a tier 1 factory that makes the more technically advanced boots for a few other leading US brands like Thorogood, right outside of Fujian China. With comfort as our primary focus, the technology we put into the soles and insoles isn't here in the US and we couldn't sacrifice comfort. The dream is to get big enough to build our own factory here either in New Hampshire or Maine.

templates.name: Where and how are your handbags made?
templates.content: Our bags are designed in the USA by Bhaskar Basu. Bhaskar was taught by his mother, Roma, who continues to guide him today. They are then made in the family-owned and operated workshop in India. Every Anuschka leather product starts with hand cutting the top grain leather and selecting the best pieces. Traditional crafters who have learned the trade from generations before them use old school techniques to create tailor made pieces. Every handbag goes through multiple stages of inspection by our quality team to ensure that the art is perfect. A family member does a final review of every bag before it is hand signed and packed.

templates.name: What is the difference between total testosterone and free testosterone?
templates.content: Total testosterone is the most commonly used measure of testosterone in clinical practice and includes free testosterone plus protein-bound testosterone. It is present within the circulation as three major fractions: free testosterone (2-3%), sex hormone binding globulin (SHBG)-bound testosterone (60-80%) and albumin-bound testosterone (20-40%). Free testosterone and albumin-bound testosterone are referred to as "bioavailable testosterone" because these fractions are thought to be readily available to the tissues.

templates.name: What are underpads used for?
templates.content: Underpads, also called "chux" or "bed pads," are absorbent pads used to protect furniture. These can be placed on a bed, wheelchair, or any other surface and have an absorbent core that locks away moisture and a waterproof plastic-backing that prevents liquid from passing through. Underpads are great for additional incontinence protection, wound care needs, or changing enteral feeding or ostomy supplies.

templates.name: How do I use the Daily Cleansing Protocol?  (US, UK, AU, CA & FR)
templates.content:
The Daily Cleansing Protocol is meant to be used everyday, morning and night, as an important step of your skincare routine. Both products in the protocol are meant to purify and detoxify the skin, while providing facial-grade results.

In the morning, apply one pump of the Daily Oil Cleanser directly to dry skin. Massage gently for a few minutes - this will wake up the skin and increase circulation. Rinse with warm water and follow with your skincare routine.

At night, you'll double cleanse with both products in the Protocol. Apply one pump of the Daily Oil Cleanser directly to dry skin. Massage gently, concentrating on areas with makeup, SPF, and dirt build up. Wash off with warm water. Immediately follow with Lactic Acid Gel Cleanser. Mix two pumps with water and massage into the skin, avoiding the eyes. Rinse with warm water. 

For best results, we recommend following the Daily Cleansing Protocol with the VB by Augustinus Bader Cell Rejuvenating Serum and Cell Rejuvenating Priming Moisturizer:

https://victoriabeckhambeauty.com/products/power-serum?_pos=1&_psq=Cell+Rejuvenating+serum&_ss=e&_v=1.0
https://victoriabeckhambeauty.com/products/vb-x-augustinus-bader-cell-rejuvenating-priming-moisturizer

templates.name: How long does the razor last and how do I care for it?
templates.content: Your razor is designed to last for years with proper care. Store your razor out of the shower, leaving it exposed to steam and moisture can cause rust. Dry your razor after each use, both the handle and the blade. Two seconds to do this really extends the life of your razor. Store your razor in a cabinet to prevent moisture and other products from splashing onto it and causing erosion.

In other cases, John leaves work very late at night, returning the next morning to find brilliant new shoe designs waiting, with no trace of authorship. As you can understand, the only explanation possible is that God is responsible for the latter two methods, whether directly or through Angel delegation. templates.name: Does Total-T contain any ingredients that inhibit aromatase and/or 5α-reductase?
templates.content:
The proposed mechanism of action for Testofen (fenugreek seed extract) is the inhibition of 5-alpha reductase, the enzyme that converts testosterone to dihydrotestosterone (DHT), and possibly aromatase inhibition as well. This was demonstrated in a gene expression profile analysis. Researchers also speculate that zinc interferes with the metabolism of testosterone by decreasing its hepatic (liver) clearance and reducing hepatic 5-alpha reductase activity.

However, to maximize hormone balance, we suggest taking Nugenix Estro-Regulator. One of the key ingredients found in Estro-Regulator is Diindolylmethane (DIM), which is an aromatase inhibitor that can help support estrogen balance - a critical factor for anyone wanting hardcore gains. In vitro evidence demonstrates DIM's anti-estrogen activity. Through its interaction with estrogen binding sites, it can help inhibit the reaction that converts testosterone into estrogen. Overall, this activity can diminish the impact estrogen has in the body.

templates.name: Does the NIRA compare to LYMA?
templates.content:
LYMA is not a true laser-based device, as they use a near-infrared LED light source (808 nm), optimized for Low Level Light Therapy (LLLT), and a red LED light source (620 nm). In addition, the predicate devices that they based their FDA clearance on are also LED devices.

NIRA has the first and only non-fractional, true laser-based device for home use. Our laser technology works by penetrating through the epidermis (outer skin) at a wavelength of 1450 nm to gently heat up the dermis to stimulate natural collagen production for younger-looking skin.

LYMA is not FDA-cleared or clinically validated specifically for wrinkle reduction like the NIRA is. LYMA's strength is more in skin tone, redness, and inflammation, whereas NIRA focuses on collagen stimulation and visible wrinkle reduction.

It's considered a 5-6 on the firmness scale with 10 being the firmest, and it's one of our most popular models because of the way it combines a medium memory foam feel without sacrificing support or durability. If you're concerned about the feel of the memory foam, you can check out the Dusk model.

templates.name: How is the GRIND shooting machine powered?
templates.content:
The GRIND Machine is powered only by a U.S.-standard electrical outlet (not battery-powered). In case you do not have access to an outlet, you can purchase a portable power supply that is compatible with the Machine - we recommend this one on Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/CyberPower-CP1500PFCLCD-Sinewave-Outlets-Mini-Tower/dp/B00429N19W/ref=sr_1_4?crid=2TG21BQ4D2AHP&keywords=cyberpower%2Bups&qid=1636563799&qsid=147-1386276-4243140&sprefix=cyberpower%2Caps%2C282&sr=8-4&sres=B000FBK3QK%2CB00429N19W%2CB0030SL08A%2CB00LEFYISA%2CB000XJLLKG%2CB07GZR981Y%2CB000RZPK1M%2CB0083TXNMM%2CB07SKX6YWS%2CB009ACPBCQ%2CB07J4RR18Y%2CB003N6WF2O%2CB00I8RVZ9W%2CB004SQSN74%2CB01615H29O%2CB00IPNPYPA&srpt=UNINTERRUPTIBLE_POWER_SUPPLY&th=1  The GRIND Team has tested it with the Machine, showing optimal performance results. On average, our tests showed that the recommended power supply lasts for about 1.5 hours, depending on the usage.

The Machine comes with a 6-foot, three-prong extension cord, but a longer cord may need to be purchased by a third party if your outlet is further away from this distance. We recommend at least a medium-duty, three-prong extension cord that is rated for outdoor usage.

templates.name: Is there preparation for the casings before use?

Fibrous Casings must be soaked in warm water 20-30 minutes before stuffing. Collagen Middles and Collagen Rounds must be soaked for 3-5 minutes in cool salt water (ratio 1 gallon water to 1 cup un-iodized salt). templates.name: Is lateral training safe for those with knee issues?
templates.content: Yes, our lateral trainers are a 'closed chain' exercise that is also non-impact. Further, because they strengthen the knee's most crucial support muscles, they're perfect for most users with knee pain. In fact, many physical therapists recommend working on a one for those who are planning to undergo, or who are recovering from, knee replacement surgery. After surgery, we always recommend checking with your physician or physical therapist for guidance about when it's appropriate to begin training again.

templates.name: Is ARMRA Colostrum FDA approved?
templates.content:
The United States Food and Drug Administration (FDA) regulates prescription and over-the-counter drugs. ARMRA, however, is a whole food, an all-natural product that is 100% drug-free.

Even so, we hold ourselves to the highest standards of testing, safety and quality. All ARMRA Colostrum is manufactured in FDA-certified facilities to adhere to the strict requirements of the FDA, under the strict criteria of Current Good Manufacturing Practices (CGMPs).

templates.name: Where are your items made / manufactured?

Depending on the fabric used, the product you receive may come from Peru, Jordan, Sri Lanka, China, or Egypt. While we once did all our manufacturing in the Los Angeles area from imported fabrics, we now construct each garment where the fabric is made. This streamlines the process and thereby reduces our carbon footprint.

templates.name: Is my bottle dishwasher safe? Microwave safe?
templates.content:
Stainless steel bottles without any coating are dishwasher safe, if the bottle has any color or graphic applied, it's not dishwasher safe unless otherwise marked on the packaging. All stainless-steel bottles are not microwave-safe.

Plastic Tritan bottles are dishwasher safe. If you're unsure if your bottle is Tritan check the bottom of the bottle or let me know and I'll be happy to help out. Plastic bottles are generally not microwave safe. The lids are top rack dishwasher safe.

templates.name: After 3 months, do I still need to use the NIRA Precision laser to maintain my results?

templates.name: How do I clean the Litter-Robot exterior?
templates.content: Cleaning the Litter-Robot exterior is easy. Just remove the globe and the drawer and use cleaner spray or cleaner wipes. You can also give them a sponge bath with mild soap and water, or take them outside for deep-cleaning with the garden hose. All other surfaces can be wiped clean, but should not be submerged. Please note that the base and bonnet of the Litter-Robot contain electrical components that should not be submerged.

templates.name: How do I take care of opals, pearls, or coral?
templates.content: Pearls and Opals thrive when worn because they absorb the natural oils and moisture from your skin! However, a rule of thumb is "Last On, First Off" when dressing to avoid chemicals or string damage. Store pearls and opals in a non-airtight soft fabric pouch to avoid drying out and exterior damage. Clean by gently rubbing each bead using a slightly damp, soft cloth to remove debris such as perfume, makeup, or perspiration. Be sure to completely dry the strand before storing to avoid thread deterioration. When cared and stored properly, pearls and opals will retain their beauty and luster providing you with heirloom quality organic beads.

templates.name: What tests have you done to ensure your towel is effective in eliminating bacteria?
templates.content:
We hired an independent agency that is located in Maryland whose mission is to reduce the transmission of infections in the communities they serve. The doctors in this agency have over 20 years of academic research experience and have worked on numerous research initiatives including the use of antimicrobial surfaces in healthcare environments. We tested multiple towels with and without silver woven technology and noticed that all towels without our unique silver technology reduced bacteria by 0%. All towels with our unique silver technology reduced bacteria by 99.998%.

We also ran multiple independent tests where our towels were subjected to repeated wash cycles. Our towels were removed at 25, 50, 75 and 100 wash intervals to see if the antibacterial system was washed away in any of these instances. The results revealed that the towels remained 99.9% effective even after 100 washes. So your towel will always be as effective for the lifetime of the product.

templates.name: How does Tongkat Ali work?

templates.name: My razor has rust. What do I do?
templates.content: Use a gentle castile soap, and an old soft toothbrush, and gently scrub any rust. You can disassemble it and soak it in warm water for a few minutes before scrubbing if there's a lot of buildup. Dry with a towel and store when done. If your razor seems to be prone to rust (say you live in a very humid environment) apply a little oil after cleaning, as it prevents corrosion by repelling water.

templates.name: What is the benefit of a wider bra strap?
templates.content: Full-figure women may find more comfort and support in bras with wider straps. Comfortable straps are of focus at Curvy Couture, where all bras are designed to have a slightly wider, cushioned strap for your everyday comfort. Thin straps can distress the shoulders due to the amount of pressure exerted on a thinner piece of fabric. Wider straps alleviate some of the pressure and can help properly support large breasts without causing stress in the shoulder and arms.

templates.name: Are your products CertiPUR certified?
templates.content:
All of our foams are eco-friendly and nontoxic as certified by CertiPUR-US®. It means the foam in the bedding has been tested to meet CertiPUR-US® rigorous standards for emissions, content, performance, and durability. Specifically, the foam is:

- Made without ozone depleters
- Made without PBDEs or the following Tris flame retardants: TCEP, TDBPP, TDCPP or TEPA
- Made without mercury, lead and heavy metals
- Made without formaldehyde
- Made without phthalates regulated by the Consumer Product Safety Commission
- Low VOC (Volatile Organic Compound) emissions for indoor air quality (less than 0.5 parts per million)

templates.name: How does the Luminox Light Technology work?
templates.content:
The fluorescent tubes from Luminox, which we call LLT are constructed in such a way that they light up for up to 25 years - with a 10-year lighting guarantee from the date of purchase, provided the watch is not exposed to strong vibrations. 

Luminox watches glow continuously for up to 25 years, even in complete darkness. Every watch is equipped with small micro gas tubes that don't require an external energy source. These micro gas lights are attached to the hands, hour digits or on the dial and in some cases in the bezel of our watches. These fluorescent tubes are harmless to humans and the environment.

templates.name: How do I clean Made In Bakeware?
templates.content:
While our bakeware is dishwasher safe, it's always best to wash by hand to keep every piece pristine. Simply use the soft side of a sponge with warm, soapy water, and you should always allow your bakeware to cool before beginning to clean or care for the piece!

For a deeper clean, sprinkle a layer of baking soda on the surface of the dish, and then add some dish soap and fill your baking dish with hot water. Let the dish soak for 15-20 minutes. Scrape the food in the baking dish to free up any residue or use a sponge to scrub the stains, pour out the water, and rinse the baking dish.

Just take your pointer finger and thumb and place it between your wrist and the clasp. Then making a snapping motion with your fingers, twist the two clasps apart. You might have to try either side of the clasp as one side works better than the other depending on which clasp is on top.

Also, be sure the logo is always on the outside, otherwise it's extremely difficult to remove!
Here's a video that may help: https://www.instagram.com/reel/CPYtat6h_Uy/

templates.name: Can I use a hair dryer instead when installing my skin?
templates.content: This's a frequently asked question and the answer is yes! It doesn't take much heat for the vinyl to become malleable. As a matter of fact, we recommend using a low setting if possible. It's better to hit the vinyl with a left and right sweeping motion, warming the vinyl just enough to handle without being too hot to touch.  It's also a good idea to heat the surface of the gun prior to installation. Having both the surface and the vinyl warm will accelerate adhesion and ensure maximum bondage.

templates.name: Air conditioner powers on but won't run
templates.content: If your air conditioner powers on but will not run, this is usually the result of an inadequate power supply for the unit. Turn the circuit breaker to the unit off and back on again. If the breaker is tripping and causing the loss of power, turn off all other electrical devices in the room besides the air conditioner. If the air conditioner runs fine with the other devices turned off, then likely the unit isn't on a dedicated circuit breaker. If your air conditioner isn't on a dedicated circuit breaker, the unit may power on but not run. The reason for this is the unit doesn't require as much power to display the settings, or even run the fan, as it does to turn on and run the compressor. The air conditioner must be on a dedicated circuit breaker not shared with other outlets. Please check the specifications sheet for your particular unit to determine the power requirements.

templates.name: Difference between Studio 2 Mini, Medium and Large
templates.content: The Studio 2, is a streamlined take on our flagship Studio Bag, and a bespoke convertible that can transition from backpack to crossbody. The Studio 2 mini has the following dimensions: 9 h x 6 w x 5 d inch. It fits a tablet, and it's great for breezy days or a night out. Our medium is the most popular and has the following dimensions: 13.75 h x 9.75 w x 9 d inch. It fits a 13" laptop, and it's the perfect everyday bag to shuffle between the office, studio, and street. Our Studio 2 large is the extra roomy one: 15.75 h x 10.5 w x 9 d inch. It fits a 15" laptop, and is designed for overnights, weekenders, longer hauls, and that one extra outfit change.

templates.name: How to use VITAMINSCRUB?
templates.content:

focusing on areas of breakouts, then rinse off thoroughly with lukewarm water; pat dry. VITAMINSCRUB will work to clean out your pores, exfoliate, dissolve dead skin cells, and prime your skin for maximum absorption of following products.

templates.name: Wash/Care Instructions
templates.content:
To take the best care of your underwear: Don't use fabric softener or bleach. Don't put them in a hot dryer or leave them to air dry in direct sunlight. Separate lights from darks and wash separately. Machine wash in warm (not hot) water. 

We recommend you air dry in the shade. If you're in a hurry, tumble dry on the lowest heat setting and remove as soon as they're dry!

templates.name: How do I set up a Sactional?
templates.content:
Sactionals require assembly with everything you need included in the boxes and no tools are required. Here are some steps to help you get started:
- Set Seat Cushions on the floor to see if they fit your room in your desired configuration.
- If you are not placing Sactionals on the carpet, put felt pads (included with Seats and Sides) on all Shoes and Feet so you don't scratch the floor.
- Each shoe has a crosshair on top to show you where the feet go.
- U-shaped steel Clamps secure Seats and Sides together.
You can watch this video for a full assembly walk through: https://lovesac.attn.tv/afbXZOM_c24S or check out these How-To PDFs: https://lovesac.attn.tv/aLgAzKLtnU5u

templates.content: While our boots don't contain any additional grams of thinsulate, most options do feature our triple-layer waterproofing system. That extra membrane not only keeps your feet dry but helps keep them toasty as well.

templates.name: How do I start a return?
templates.content: You can start your return here: https://publicdesire.returns.international/

templates.name: Sizing
templates.content: Happy to help you find the right size! Our clothes generally run true to size. Would you mind sharing your usual size?

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We don't currently offer free shipping, but all promos will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out!

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at contact@threadwallets.com. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://pixibeauty.co.uk/pages/returns

templates.name: Can you custom engrave a message on the ring?
templates.content: Yes! In fact, this is one of our complimentary services. There are limitations in terms of length, symbols, ring size etc. Most customers are happy with their engraving options. It does not add more lead time. You may also request it mid production if you haven't made up your mind quite yet. Just email us!

templates.name: Are Your Products Natural? (US, UK, AU, CA & FR)
templates.content: We believe the best formulations are a blend of nature and clean science. While we are a clean brand, we aren't a natural brand; however, we aim to infuse naturally derived ingredients when possible.

templates.name: How do I place an order with a Virtual or Paper Gift Cards?
templates.content:
To redeem your Virtual Gift Card:

1. In the Checkout, paste your Gift Card Code in the Gift Card Box.
2. After you've redeemed your Virtual Gift Card, you can check your account Store Credit Balance by clicking on the link "Check Gift Card Balance" in the footer, or logging into your account: https://www.marymaxim.com/account/login

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We offer free shipping on domestic orders over $49. Maybe you can add something else to reach the minimum?

templates.name: Insole details
templates.content: Our stack height is around 17-20mm, the height difference from the heel to toe is 4mm, and the difference is at the insole, which has 10mm height on the back and 6mm on the front part.

templates.name: Affiliate program
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! You can learn more and sign up here https://dippindaisys.com/pages/affiliate-program

templates.name: Are your shoes steel-toed?
templates.content: No, steel toes are getting more outdated by the day. The only reason you still see them around is they're the cheapest safety toe to make. We use a newer technology called Nano Composite Safety toe, it meets the same ASTM safety standards as steel, but is half the weight, doesn't conduct electricity, and doesn't get cold in the winter or hot in the summer.

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss wholesale is to email us directly at wholesale@kerotin.com. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Do you ship to PO Boxes?
templates.content: I'm afraid we don't offer shipping to P.O. Boxes at this time.

templates.name: I am trying to conceive, when should I use the pearls?
templates.content: If you are trying to conceive, we suggest using our products 3-4 days after your menstrual cycle to detox and cleanse your womb.

templates.name: What is the warranty for the Shears?
templates.content: Our Sam Villa® shears come with a lifetime warranty that covers you from defects in material or workmanship, excluding damage and normal wear. This lifetime warranty is only valid if your Sam Villa® shears are serviced by our sharpening service partner, Precision Edge. The lifetime warranty does not include shear sharpening and/or servicing fees.

templates.name: Art/painting/print related questions
templates.content:
The best way to handle this is to contact us at curator@saatchiart.com for further information. One of our Curations will be able to assist and connect with the artist directly for further information.

Alternatively, you can go through our contact us form: https://saatchiart.attn.tv/sl/uCrZZKo6 -- and select "speak with a curator" or "artwork inquiry" as the contact reason. I hope this helps!
